meanings.definition: Podgiest: having a thick, short, and rounded body
meanings.sent1: The pug was the podgiest dog in the park.
meanings.sent2: The baby elephant was the podgiest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The podgiest squirrel tried to fit into a tiny hole in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her podgiest teddy bear seemed to be bursting at the seams.
meanings.sent5: The podgiest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
